text: is a Japanese football player. ==Biography== Kojima was born in Toyota on January 30, 1997. After graduating from Waseda University, he joined J1 League club Oita Trinita in 2019. In 2020, he moved to J2 League club Albirex Niigata. In May 2019, Kojima was selected the Japan national team for 2019 Copa América, but he did not play in the match. ==Club statistics== .Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2019 (NSK MOOK)", 9 February 2019, Japan, (p. 146 out of 289) Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League Cup Cup League cup League cup Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.
